name: Who Goes First? Player Picker
description:
Need help randomly choosing a person to go first in a game? Or who was the first one do a chore?

Pick Player is useful app for saving and logging statistics per player and who went first last time as well as tracking who can go first next time.

Also Included:

- Random number generator
- Random numbered list generator

This app features:

• Send your calculations or conversions by email
• Universal App (iPhone, iPod Touch, and iPad)
• Fast app switching
• Automatically Saves Your Inputs
• Latest version of iOS is supported
• All iPhone and iPad screen are supported

No network connectivity required.
